title: aipdabe
blurb: Backend/engine for AI Personal Digital Assistants: routing, tools, policy, and memory.
description: aipdabe provides the orchestration layer for AI PDAs. It abstracts model providers, tools, and skills; enforces safety/policy; manages per-user memory vectors and notes; and supports background/long-running tasks with auditable logs. Built for multi-modal assistants that plan, retrieve, and act across services.
